elements.name: Complete a successful transaction with shop On (web checkout)

steps.name: I am on the use cases screen
I select the Shop On web checkout use case
I add items to cart
I click on go to cart button
I click on checkout button
I search for bank "Demo Bank"
I select the bank
I click on ok got it
I fill in username "usernameTest"
I fill in password "password"
I click on agree and sign in text
I click on agree and sign in button
I click on withdrawn button

elements.name: Complete a successful transaction with shop On

steps.name: I am on the use cases screen
I select the Shop.On use case
I add items to cart
I click on go to cart button
I click on checkout button
I search for bank "Demo Bank"
I select the bank
I click on ok got it
I fill in username "usernameTest"
I fill in password "Jwwg863%3bs@"
I click on agree and sign in text
I click on agree and sign in button
I click on withdrawn button
I click on back to checkout button
I click on place order button

elements.name: Complete a successful transaction with Game.on

steps.name: I am on the use cases screen
I select the Game.on use case
I search for bank "Demo Bank"
I select the bank
I click on ok got it
I fill in username "usernameTest"
I fill in password "password"
I click on agree and sign in text
I click on agree and sign in button
I click on withdrawn button
I click on back to checkout button
I choose a deposit amount value "$10"
I click on Make deposit button
I should see the message "Deposit completed"
I go back to use cases screen
